column4: how, or what tool would you use to identify a lan cable out of a bunch? one end of the lan cable is unterminated, otherwise I would just use cable tester......
before installing, put labels on the two ends with "A" and "A" or something so when you are looking at one, you can find the other easily
doh. umm....boo. yeah that sounds like the way to do it. and then label them when you figure it out so you dont have to do it again
